item.title: Essential Gear for an Emergency Kit—for Cars or Go-Bags
item.description: We consulted preparedness experts and WIRED's team of testers for the essential gear in case of wildfires, earthquakes, and lord knows what else.

item.title: People Who Say They’re Experiencing AI Psychosis Beg the FTC for Help
item.description: The Federal Trade Commission received 200 complaints mentioning ChatGPT between November 2022 and August 2025. Several attributed delusions, paranoia,...

item.title: NASA’s Boss Just Shook Up the Agency’s Plans to Land on the Moon
item.description: Sean Duffy called out SpaceX for being “behind schedule” on a lunar lander and said he’d explore other options.

item.title: Resistant Bacteria Are Advancing Faster Than Antibiotics
